page.title: 02ROA ISLAND
page.content: This is a small island which is very important to Walney and Barrow because it has got a Lifeboat station.The island is connected to the mainland by road.The school on Roa is a special one for the physically handicapped.There is a small "watchtower"on Roa.This used to be a customs post and later a church mission. You can get actoss to Piel Island on a small ferry.The majority of Roa is taken up by about forty houses.This community has amenities such as a Pub (the ROA ISLAND),marina and boat-club,Post-office,and regular bus-service.
